clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Aclidinium bromide inhalation powder is indicated for the long term maintenance treatment of bronchospasm associated with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease COPD including chronic bronchitis and emphysema

contraindications.disease: Most common adverse reactions 3 incidence and greater than placebo are headache nasopharyngitis and cough
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Aclidinium does not prolong the QTc interval or have significant effects on cardiac rhythm
